mapper.select: select t.contractnumber, t.appraisalcost, p.CHINANAME, c.CUSTOMERNAMEEN, t.country, s2.SUPPLIERNAMECN, s.numbers, s.currency, s.unitprice, s.salesamount, t.payment, t.collectionaccount, t.saleresponsibility, s.currency1, s.unitprice1, s.purchaseamount, s.hscode, s.drawback, t.productresponsibility, t.appraisalcost, t.bill, t.billtime, t.freight, t.premium, t.appraisalcost, r.CONTRACTNO, fs.EX_RATE, fs.AMOUNT, fs.INVOICEAMOUNT, fs.BILLINGTIME, fs.amountreceived, fp.INVOICENUMBER, fs.arrivaltime, fs.COMMISSIONAMOUNTA, fp.FKTIME, fp.FKMONEY, d.VALUE1 as fukuan, d2.VALUE1 as caigoubsizhong, d3.VALUE1 as caigoubizhong from transportgood t inner join saledetails s on s.transportgood_id = t.transportgood_id left join products p on s.productid = p.PRODUCTS_ID left join customerbaseinfor c on t.customerid = c.CUSTOMERBASEINFOR_ID left join supplierbaseinfor s2 on s.supplierid = s2.SUPPLIERBASEINFOR_ID left join returngoods r on t.contractnumber = r.CONTRACTNO left join fin_sales fs on t.transportgood_id = fs.TRANSPORTGOOD_ID and fs.PRODUCTUS = s.productid left join fin_purchase fp on fs.TRANSPORTGOOD_ID = fp.TRANSPORTGOOD_ID and fp.PRODUCTEN = s.productid left join dictionary d on t.payment = d.CODE and d.PCODE = 'PY009' left join dictionary d2 on s.currency = d2.CODE and d2.PCODE = 'PY008' left join dictionary d3 on s.currency1 = d3.CODE and d3.PCODE = 'PY008' where t.STATUS != '1' group by t.transportgood_id,s.productid,s.supplierid
